name: barbajoe
description: A PNPM Workspace that untilizes Astro as an app and a React and Svelte component library.
author: Joe S

scripts.all: pnpm i && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.github: pnpm i && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.lint:apps: pnpm -F landing lint && pnpm -F lib-staging lint
scripts.lint:packages: pnpm -F css-lib lint && pnpm -F react-lib lint && pnpm -F svelte-lib lint
scripts.build:packages: pnpm build:css-lib && pnpm build:react-lib && pnpm build:svelte-lib
scripts.start:libs: pnpm start:css-lib & pnpm start:svelte-lib & pnpm start:react-lib
